dimensions:
without mount: 34 1/4 x 18 in. (87 x 45.7 cm)
with mount: 82 3/4 x 22 5/8 in. (210.2 x 57.5 cm)
title: Landscape of Mt. Huang
medium: hanging scroll, ink and colors on paper
inscriptions: Inscribed, dated ren chen year (1952), signed "Binhong at the ageof 89" and with two seals of the artist.
